lead_paragraph: Officials of the YIVO Institute for Jewish Research combed through the cluttered Bronx apartment of Chaim Grade, the esteemed Yiddish writer.
snippet: Officials of the YIVO Institute for Jewish Research combed through the cluttered Bronx apartment of Chaim Grade, the esteemed Yiddish writer.

byline.original: By JOSEPH BERGER; Compiled by DAVE ITZKOFF
